title: Can I put League of Legends picture on my shirt?
body:
As i love league of legends i want to put a picture of one the epic skins on a shirt to wear. Hyped about putting the fnatic skins splash.

But idk if it copyright. Is it only for when your making money of it? I certainly wont be.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

For a bit more info in regards to using intellectual property, check out our [legal jibber jabber](http://www.riotgames.com/legal-jibber-jabber). :]
do you plan on selling the shirt?
then I think you should be fine
What does it mean if you're borrowing the shirt to someone and you're borrowing money from that person?

Riot is pretty supportive of the community made stuff. Unless you plan on mass producing and selling these shirts there should be no issue at all. Even if there was it would be very unlikely that riot would find out about your shirt shirt, track you down, and then sue you over a shirt.
